briefTitle: Re-licensing Study to Assess Inflexal V Formulated With WHO Recommended Influenza Strains
officialTitle: Open, Non-randomized Trial to Assess the Immunogenicity and Safety of the 2012/2013-Season Influenza Vaccine in Elderly and Young Subjects According to EMA Regulations

interventions.name: Inflexal V
otherNames: Inflexal V influenza vaccine (surface antigen, inactivated, virosome) formulated for the WHO requirements of the 2012-2013 season, each 0.5 mL dose containing:
• 15 µg HA antigen of A/California/7/2009 (H1N1)-like virus
• 15 µg HA antigen of A/Victoria/361/2011 (H3N2)-like virus
• 15 µg HA antigen of B/Wisconsin/1/2010-like virus

arms.label: Adults from 18 to 60 years old inclusive

summary: The study is to assess whether the influenza vaccine Inflexal V for season 2012/2013 fulfills the EMA requirements for re-registration of influenza vaccines.

effectByArm.arm: Adults From 18 to 60 Years Old Inclusive
